notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Halakhic decisions of Asher ben Jeḥiel, aka Rosh, followed by the same author's commentary on the mishnah on sheḳalim.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive script, unpunctuated, of 14th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Pisḳe ha-Rosh seu Asheri ben Jechiel. Decisiones in Ordin. Talmud. Moed. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,293.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Samuel Schönblum of Vienna: purchased by the British Museum from him on 16 April 1866: inscribed, folio [266v].
